videos.descripcion: My client wanted a more conceptual tattoo of something that included birds, this is what I came up with! I'm really pleased with how it turned out.
We are big fans of the studio ghibli movies here at a studio!! here is Kiri dotwork tattoo of Totoro from My Neighbor Totoro.

videos.titulo: Dotwork & Ornamental Arm Tattoo Ideas for Men and Women
videos.descripcion: Alex Santucci is one of the very talented and experienced tattoo artists located in Ancona AN, Italy. He has a very unique and uncommon Dotwork & Ornamental style. All of these tattoos are designed by himself and if you are looking for a Dotwork & Ornamental tattoo like them, You can contact him via https://www.antstattoo.it/contatti/, or please contact him with the links below. He is located in Granada, Spain.

videos.titulo: Geometric Tattoo Time Lapse / Dotwork Pattern
videos.descripcion: Hello everyone! I’m Raul Wesche and today we have a calf tattoo. As always I feel inspired by Sacred Geometry and it’s meaning in our life. I like to create high contrast between elements, dotwork and line work, dark and light, sharp edges and soft edges.

Dotwork tattoos are viewed as one of the least painful types of tattoo. The precise, delicate dots used to build up an image do not drag the skin and therefore cause less pain. Getting a dot work tattoo in a low pain location such as back of the shoulder will mean a relatively less painful tattoo.
